meanings.definition: relating to a chamber or chambers
meanings.sent1: The cameral walls were painted a calming blue.
meanings.sent2: The cameral space was filled with antique furniture.
meanings.sent3: The cameral room had a secret door hidden behind a bookshelf.
meanings.sent4: The cameral atmosphere of the library made it a perfect place to study.
meanings.sent5: The cameral chamber echoed with the sound of footsteps.

meanings.definition: of or relating to a camera
meanings.sent1: She bought a cameral bag to protect her camera.
meanings.sent2: The cameral lens captured the stunning sunset.
meanings.sent3: The cameral strap was comfortable on her shoulder.
meanings.sent4: His cameral skills improved after taking a photography class.
meanings.sent5: The cameral flash illuminated the dark room.

meanings.definition: pertaining to a private room or chamber
meanings.sent1: The cameral retreat offered a peaceful escape from the city.
meanings.sent2: The cameral study was filled with books and a cozy armchair.
meanings.sent3: She enjoyed spending time in her cameral sanctuary.
